entity.name: story_sentences
entity.query: select story_sentences_id || '_ss' as id, 'ss' as field_type, * from story_sentences where '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR db_row_last_updated > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: media_sets_media_map
entity.deltaQuery: select media_sets_media_map_id, media_id::varchar from media_sets_media_map where db_row_last_updated > '${dih.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select story_sentences_id as id from story_sentences where media_id = ${media_sets_media_map.media_id}

entity.name: media_tags_map
entity.query: select tags_id as tags_id_media, * from media_tags_map
entity.deltaQuery: select media_tags_map_id, media_id::varchar from media_tags_map where db_row_last_updated > '${dih.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select story_sentences_id as id from story_sentences where media_id = ${media_tags_map.media_id}

entity.name: stories_tags_map
entity.query: select tags_id as tags_id_stories, * from stories_tags_map
entity.deltaQuery: select stories_tags_map_id, stories_id::varchar from stories_tags_map where db_row_last_updated > '${dih.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select story_sentences_id as id from story_sentences where stories_id = ${stories_tags_map.stories_id}
